mapper.select: select f.resourcenum, f.analysis, f.path, f.name from fbresource f, madeavatar m where f.resourcenum in(m.face, m.nose, m.mouth, m.ear) and m.selectionnum = #{selectionNum} union select f.resourcenum, f.analysis, c.path, c.name from fbresource f, resourcecolor c, (select * from madeavatar where selectionnum = #{selectionNum}) m where f.resourcenum = m.hair and m.hair = c.resourcenum and m.hairColor = c.color union select f.resourcenum, f.analysis, c.path, c.name from fbresource f, resourcecolor c, (select * from madeavatar where selectionnum = #{selectionNum}) m where f.resourcenum = m.eye and m.eye = c.resourcenum and m.eyeColor = c.color union select f.resourcenum, f.analysis, c.path, c.name from fbresource f, resourcecolor c, (select * from madeavatar where selectionnum = #{selectionNum}) m where f.resourcenum = m.body and m.body = c.resourcenum and m.bodyColor = c.color

select f.resourcenum, f.analysis, f.path, f.name from fbresource f, madehouse m where f.resourcenum in(m.door, m.window, m.chimney) and m.selectionnum = #{selectionNum} union select f.resourcenum, f.analysis, c.path, c.name from fbresource f, resourcecolor c, (select * from madehouse where selectionnum = #{selectionNum}) m where f.resourcenum = m.roof and m.roof = c.resourcenum and m.roofColor = c.color union select f.resourcenum, f.analysis, c.path, c.name from fbresource f, resourcecolor c, (select * from madehouse where selectionnum = #{selectionNum}) m where f.resourcenum = m.wall and m.wall = c.resourcenum and m.wallColor = c.color
select * from fbresource where resourcenum=( select yard from madehouse where selectionnum=#{selectionNum} )

select a.eyecolor,a.haircolor,a.bodycolor ,h.roofcolor,h.wallcolor ,e.selection1color,e.selection2color,e.selection3color,e.selection4color ,e.selection5color,e.selection6color,e.selection7color,e.selection8color ,e.selection9color,e.selection10color,e.selection11color,e.selection12color from madeavatar a, madehouse h, etc e where a.selectionnum = h.selectionnum and h.selectionnum = e.selectionnum and a.selectionnum = e.selectionnum and e.selectionnum=#{selectionnum}

select a.selectionnum as selectionnum ,q.quiznum as quiznum ,q.question as question ,q.select1 as select1 ,q.select2 as select2 ,nvl(q.select3,'') as select3 ,nvl(q.select4,'') as select4 ,q.answer as answer ,q.division as division ,a.myanswer as myanswer from quiz q , scene s ,(select myanswer,scenenum,selectionnum from selectiondetail where selectionnum = #{selectionnum}) a where s.quiznum = q.quiznum and q.division = 1 and a.scenenum= s.scenenum and s.scenenum in(select scenenum from selectiondetail where selectionnum = #{selectionnum}) and q.answer is not null and q.answer != -1
select colorname from fbcolor order by colornum asc
select coloranalysis from fbcolor where colornum = #{colornum}
